verses.name: Esther 4:4
verses.text: So Esther’s maids and her chamberlains came and told it her. Then was the queen exceedingly grieved; and she sent raiment to clothe Mordecai, and to take away his sackcloth from him: but he received it not.

verses.name: Esther 4:5
verses.text: Then called Esther for Hatach, one of the king’s chamberlains, whom he had appointed to attend upon her, and gave him a commandment to Mordecai, to know what it was, and why it was.

verses.name: Esther 4:6
verses.text: So Hatach went forth to Mordecai unto the street of the city, which was before the king’s gate.
